education.title: Computer Programming and Analysis / Advanced Diploma (Co-op)
points: Honours: Dean's Honour List for Semesters 1 & 2

Highlighted courses: Algorithms and Problem Solving (Java), Database Concepts and Design, Web Programming and Design, Operating Systems, Database Programming (SQL), Advanced Front-End Programming (React), Object-Oriented Programming (Java)

In progress: Systems Design (SDLC, Agile), Cross-platform App Development (React Native), Modern Web Technologies (Node.js, MongoDB), Data Structures and Algorithms (Java), Highlevel Programming Languages (Python, Django)

workExp.name: Sales Associate
points: Oversaw store operations in the absence of supervisors; maintaining cleanliness and replenishing necessary products
Addressed cliental concerns and ensured customer satisfaction with positive and efficient customer service
Provided any additional support to supervisors in and out of the store (i.e. unloaded imported goods, assisted with events run by the college)

overview.title: Overview
summary: I am a highly dedicated student taking Computer Programming and Analysis program at Humber College.
With my experiences within my program, I hope to specialize in web or software development.
After discovering computer science in high school, I've become committed to immersing myself in that field.
I enjoyed creating webpages and discovered at Humber that my career has to be in software or web development.
I'm intrigued by the creation of apps, websites, and software and wish to make many of my own.
I am at the beginning of my studies with some experience in the workforce but am strong in spirit; always persevering through challenges and continuously learning.
I have experience in customer service which has aided in building on present skills; solidifying communication and organization skills.
I believe I have strong time management and collaborative skills, efficiently working in a team while keeping up with project deadlines and easily working independently.
